column5: Oct 15 - In a new special report  Fitch Ratings discusses the potential outcome of AT&T  Inc.'s  (AT&T) review of its rural access line business  which is expected to be announced in November 2012. However  until the outcome is known  event risk exists for carriers that could potentially acquire AT&T's lines such as CenturyLink   Frontier  and Windstream.  In early 2012  AT&T di

column4: TEXT-Fitch affirms AXIS Capital Holdings
column5: Oct 15 - Fitch Ratings has affirmed AXIS Capital Holdings  Limited's (AXIS Capital) 'A' Issuer Default Rating (IDR) and 'A-' senior debt rating. Additionally  Fitch has affirmed the 'A+' Insurer Financial Strength (IFS) ratings of AXIS Capital's operating subsidiaries. The Rating Outlook is  Stable. A full list of ratings follows at the end of this release.   Fitch's ratings reflect AXIS Capital's solid history of underwriting results   strong capitalization  and conservative investment profile
